url.name: Coursera: Спеціалізація Digital Signal Processing (École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne)
url.intro: This Specialization provides a full course in Digital Signal Processing, with a focus on audio processing and data transmission. You will start from the basic concepts of discrete-time signals and proceed to learn how to analyze data via the Fourier transform, how to manipulate data via digital filters, and how to convert analog signals into digital format.
